Text:
Just download this one , it has crack included.  And stop splitting up torrents.  What is the point to upload something you can already find on TPB.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7697542/Nuance_Dragon_NaturallySpeaking_v12.0_Premium_ISO-TBE

I didn't know of that one when I uploaded, and not everyone needs a crack.  What's the point of writing BS comments?  Also, you think the people happy with this torrent really want to dl another three gigs for the same thing?

No, I think that people are just going to download that one.  It has more seeders, and it has a crack provided in it.   

So why waste your time downloading this one.

This is my whole point.

Thanks for trying, sorry if I offended you.  

People want cracks/full versions.   :)
crwildman is absolutly right. Everyone wants full programs, cracks, serial or patch. Other way, the program is useless. That's why we all come here and that's why this web is great.

No offense taken, no worries, but you need to think outside your own view.  I myself have many times come here NOT wanting cracked and edited software.  I want the original untouched package, because I have the activation keys, or a preferred crack of my own.  The seeds on this are there, and have been for some time.  Thank you for linking that other package though, I had it linked before I had to re-upload this. lol
